blackknight3.name: Black Knight
blackknight3.title: Mortal Legend
blackknight3.description: A swordsman and general, revered as the strongest of Daein's Four Riders under Mad King Ashnard. It is said he protected the Dawn Maiden, who sought to restore Daein's former prosperity. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

Castle Hall: Darkness is my way of life. How could anyone really know me if they cannot see me?
To surpass General Gawain was my ultimate goal as a swordsman.
No thanks are needed. I do nothing more than fulfill my duty.
My armor lost its protection after my battle with him...
The light of judgment is approaching...
Visit: Use your strong will to keep on the path toward self-improvement, just as [F]has.
Level: Make your peace. This blow will be your end.
In battle, you either kill or be killed... There is nothing else.
Summon: You are the tactician who commands Heroes from other worlds? Then I shall make my blade of use to you.
Learn Skill: My life was shrouded in darkness. There was not anyone capable of measuring its meaning...until now.
Confession:
I assume you ask to know what I am thinking out of either pity or compassion...
You want to know why a man such as me would abandon his identity to live only by the sword?
I find the world in which I live to be grotesque, filled with endless conflict between those who harbor hate.
Mortals filled with contempt that knows no bounds...
If you wish to hear more, then you should inquire of my master, [S].
As for me, I will return to the darkness beneath the moonlight.
I wish to remain a phantom in the night, one that crosses blades with him in the end.
Status: Hahahaha... A Legendary Hero? Me? What sort of legacy could I have left?
Hm. Strike my armor all you wish. You will only hurt your hand.
I was once one of the Four Riders, serving the army of old Daein.
If you hope to protect her, become stronger. Strong enough to surpass me, and stronger still.
My maiden...I will stop at nothing to protect you.
I will become your shield. Do not leave my side.
